channel.title: Learn how to crack passwords!
channel.description:
i take no credit for any of this info this was posted on the Fkn0wned bored by prefeK
Ok, so I'm assumming many of you would like to crack your own passwords. Personally, I use two ways:
-Google-hacking -Accessdiver
Google-hacking is easy, but many of the results are dead links. On the other hand, Accessdiver is much harder, but each result you get is guaranteed to work. I will teach you how to use both.
GOOGLE HACKING:
What is Google-hacking, you ask? It is a way to leech passwords using Google's famous search-engine.
Here is a step by step tutorial to hack google:
1. Open up your browser. 2. Go to www.google.com 3. Type in "http://*:*@www" domainname (domainname as in the site you want) For instance, if I wanted to find logins for bangbros, I would type in "http://*:*@www" bangbros 4. Press enter and search the results.
ACCESSDIVER:
Before you use accessdiver, learn about brute force, proxies, and wordlists.
Since it is a bit tedious, I will refrain from using two pages, and instead give you a link to a tutorial:
http://members.fortunecity.se/clan9/eng.html
[b]Ron: [/b] Editted out TUT in title. It's the tutorial section, it's implied.

item.title: Learn how to crack passwords!
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

[quote=“saltnpepper, post:3, topic:9130”]you should call it google-cracking not hacking… don’t want to start a debate, but there is alot of difference between hacking and cracking… real hackers actually think cracking is a lame use of your abilities…
oh yeh super’s tut is good, but a bit basic…
@super you should also put a warning that you are not liable for whatever they do with this information (just to protect urself :P)[/quote]

True. It pisses me off a little when my friends are like “Hack me a RuneScape account” … I’m like “You can’t hack a RuneScape account…” and there like “ya” and I’m all “no” and… Just kidding. But it is annoying when people get them mixed up >_<

Read full topic
